ygData.subject: The War of the ARK!

The beginning of a storm is brewing, as leaves and debris shifted and 
swir=
led and foul winds began to blow. But this is no normal storm, 
but one of =
darkness and fear and power.

At the ark Lord Elder struggled desperately t=
o get the ark ready for 
the coming wave, as the forces from Hydras' base -=
 who only hours 
before were fighting amongst themselves - have now joined =
forces in a 
desperate gamut to protect the ark, their past and their futur=
e.

Meanwhile the dark specters of destruction have grown from the tiny 
mo=
tes on the edge of the horizon to shades of fury that bore down on 
the see=
mingly defenseless ark. Like huge misshapen hornets from some 
dark and ang=
ry hive, the great host of minions close in as weapons 
began to charge, th=
e collective wine of it the harbinger of the 
destruction to come. 

Somewh=
ere inside the dark mass, their king and commander ordered the 
chaos that =
swarmed through the air, his powerful sensors sweeping 
ahead of them, sear=
ching for someone he has yet to find! Nightrazor, 
Nightstrike and Darkfate=
 closed in to the ranks as well, falling in 
behind Cyclonus, Tumult and De=
cibel, even as in the distance Scourge 
was quickly falling into his place.=


Meanwhile, on the horizon and closing fast are the hodgepodge 
alliance o=
f the Maximals and Decepticons, Autobots and Decepticons as 
they fought fo=
r every ounce of speed to keep up with the advancing 
minions!

Yet at the =
ark, standing like some lone sentinel, Legacy in his tank 
mode stood facin=
g the initial onslaught of the minions. With a 
stalwart resolution his shi=
eld absorbed the initial blasts as he 
braced the opening foray, buying pre=
cious seconds for the valiant 
Maximals who sought to reactivate the ark's =
defenses and the enduring 
fighters who closed in from their flight from th=
e black fortress!

The war of the Ark had begun, woe to those caught in its=
 wake!

Preston
